main event: An observation was made of a stationary round object appearing red and orange on October 21, 1955, in Exeter, New Hampshire.
interesting points: The observation lasted for one minute., The object was described as stationary and round, with its size unknown., The color of the object appeared to be red and orange., The document concluded the object could be a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical phenomenon., Another fast-moving bright object was observed the next day traveling at very high speed.
